title: Ninja Turtles
alt: The henchmen Bebop and Rocksteady have hijacked the musical genres for us just like the Lone Ranger hijacked the William Tell Overture for our parents.
transcript:
[Four pie graphs, each colored green and brown.]
Leonardo
[Almost one-half green.]
Michelangelo
[More than one-half green.]
Donatello
[Five-sixths green.]
Raphael
[Roughly half-and-half.]
[A legend]
Notoriety as a
[Brown.] Renaissance artist
[Green.] Ninja turtle
